thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 2 of 287
thread.title: J Rust
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by J Rust

author: J Rust
title: J Rust
text: I called for a loan review & wanted to shave some years off. Next thing I knew everything fell into place & I was able to refinance for a shorter term & still a low interest rate. Had a couple of issues with the on line documents to sign but Zade was fantastic & got it all resolved in minimum time. I was happy with the ease of document review & the entire closing took 15 mins!! Finally the othe loan was paid off in 4 days after closing! The "app" is a true time saver & I used it throughout the process!! Overall another great experience!!
